  })

  n(60),
  n(40);
  var r = n(385),
  i = n.n(r),

  a = n.n(o),
  s = n(389);
  function c(t, e) {
    return new RegExp('(\\s|^)' + e + '(\\s|$)').test(t.className)
  }
  function u(t, e) {
    return !(!e || c(t, e)) && (t.className += (t.className.length > 0 ? ' ' : '') + e, !0)
  }
  function l(t, e) {
    if (e && c(t, e)) {
      var n = new RegExp('((\\s|^)' + e + ')|(' + e + '(\\s|$))|(' + e + ')');
      return t.className = t.className.replace(n, '').trim(),
      !0
    }
    return !1
  }
  function f(t) {
    return new RegExp('(?:^|;\\s*)' + encodeURIComponent(t).replace(/[\-\.\+\*]/g, '\\$&') + '\\s*\\=').test(document.cookie)
  }
  var d = i() ({
    getItem: function (t) {
      return decodeURIComponent(document.cookie.replace(new RegExp('(?:(?:^|.*;)\\s*' + encodeURIComponent(t).replace(/[\-\.\+\*]/g, '\\$&') + '\\s*\\=\\s*([^;]*).*$)|^.*$'), '$1')) || null
    },
    setItem: function (t, e, n, r, i, o) {
      if (!t || /^(?:expires|max\-age|path|domain|secure)$/i.test(t)) return !1;
      var a = '';
      if (n) switch (n.constructor) {
        case Number:
          a = n === 1 / 0 ? '; expires=Fri, 31 Dec 9999 23:59:59 GMT' : '; max-age=' + n;
          break;
        case String:
          a = '; expires=' + n;
          break;
        case Date:
          a = '; expires=' + n.toUTCString()
      }
      return document.cookie = encodeURIComponent(t) + '=' + encodeURIComponent(e) + a + (i ? '; domain=' + i : '') + (r ? '; path=' + r : '') + (o ? '; secure' : ''),
      !0
    },
    removeItem: function (t, e, n) {
      return !(!t || !this.hasItem(t) || (document.cookie = encodeURIComponent(t) + '=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT' + (n ? '; domain=' + n : '') + (e ? '; path=' + e : ''), 0))
    },
    hasItem: f,
    keys: function () {
      for (var t = document.cookie.replace(/((?:^|\s*;)[^\=]+)(?=;|$)|^\s*|\s*(?:\=[^;]*)?(?:\1|$)/g, '').split(/\s*(?:\=[^;]*)?;\s*/), e = 0; e < t.length; e++) t[e] = decodeURIComponent(t[e]);
      return t
    }
  }); !function () {
    try {
      var t = document.createElement('canvas');
      !(!t.getContext || !t.getContext('2d')) && t.toDataURL('image/webp').indexOf('data:image/webp')
    } catch (t) {
      return !1
    }

function (t, e, n) {
var r = n(787),
i = n(786);
e.NUMERIC = {
id: 'Numeric',
bit: 1,
ccBits: [
10,
12,
14
]
},
e.ALPHANUMERIC = {
id: 'Alphanumeric',
bit: 2,
ccBits: [
9,
11,
13
]
},
e.BYTE = {
id: 'Byte',
bit: 4,
ccBits: [
8,
16,
16
]
},
e.KANJI = {
id: 'Kanji',
bit: 8,
ccBits: [
8,
10,
12
]
},
e.MIXED = {
bit: - 1
},
e.getCharCountIndicator = function (t, e) {
if (!t.ccBits) throw new Error('Invalid mode: ' + t);
if (!r.isValid(e)) throw new Error('Invalid version: ' + e);
return e >= 1 && e < 10 ? t.ccBits[0] : e < 27 ? t.ccBits[1] : t.ccBits[2]
},
e.getBestModeForData = function (t) {
return i.testNumeric(t) ? e.NUMERIC : i.testAlphanumeric(t) ? e.ALPHANUMERIC : i.testKanji(t) ? e.KANJI : e.BYTE
},
e.toString = function (t) {
if (t && t.id) return t.id;
throw new Error('Invalid mode')
},
e.isValid = function (t) {
return t && t.bit && t.ccBits
},
e.from = function (t, n) {
if (e.isValid(t)) return t;
try {
return function (t) {
  if ('string' != typeof t) throw new Error('Param is not a string');
  switch (t.toLowerCase()) {
    case 'numeric':
      return e.NUMERIC;
    case 'alphanumeric':
      return e.ALPHANUMERIC;
    case 'kanji':
      return e.KANJI;
    case 'byte':
      return e.BYTE;
    default:
      throw new Error('Unknown mode: ' + t)
  }
}(t)
} catch (t) {
return n
}
}

function (t, e, n) {

function r() {
  return ''
}
function i(t, e) {

  var n = window[t];

}
function o(t) {

    var e = i('__NEPGEAR_IS_MY_WAIFU__', t);

      code: e.code,
      data: e.data || null,
      error: 0 === e.code ? null : new Error(e.msg || e.message || '服务端接口错误 ' + t + '__NEPGEAR_IS_MY_WAIFU__'),
      msg: e.msg || e.message || '服务端接口错误 ' + t + '__NEPGEAR_IS_MY_WAIFU__'
    }
     : null
  } catch (t) {
    return null
  }
}
function a(t) {
  try {
    var e = i('__NEPTUNE_IS_MY_WAIFU__', t);
    return e ? {
      code: e.code,
      data: e.data || null,
      error: 0 === e.code ? null : new Error(e.msg || e.message || '服务端接口错误 ' + t + '__NEPTUNE_IS_MY_WAIFU__'),
      msg: e.msg || e.message || '服务端接口错误 ' + t + '__NEPTUNE_IS_MY_WAIFU__'
    }
     : null
  } catch (t) {
    return null
  }
}
function s(t) {
  var e = a(t);
  if (e) {
    if (0 === e.code) return e;
    var n = o(t);
    return n || e
  }
  return o(t)
}

    var e = u() (t);
    return l.forEach(function (t) {
      e = e.replace(t, 'https$1')
    }),
    JSON.parse(e)
  } catch (e) {
    return console.error('HTTPS Transform Fail', e),
    t
  }
}

function i(t) {
  return new RegExp('(?:^|;\\s*)' + encodeURIComponent(t).replace(/[\-\.\+\*]/g, '\\$&') + '\\s*\\=').test(document.cookie)
}
var o = Object.freeze({
  getItem: function (t) {
    return decodeURIComponent(document.cookie.replace(new RegExp('(?:(?:^|.*;)\\s*' + encodeURIComponent(t).replace(/[\-\.\+\*]/g, '\\$&') + '\\s*\\=\\s*([^;]*).*$)|^.*$'), '$1')) || null
  },
  setItem: function (t, e, n, r, i, o) {
    if (!t || /^(?:expires|max\-age|path|domain|secure)$/i.test(t)) return !1;
    var a = '';
    if (n) switch (n.constructor) {
      case Number:
        a = n === 1 / 0 ? '; expires=Fri, 31 Dec 9999 23:59:59 GMT' : '; max-age=' + n;
        break;
      case String:
        a = '; expires=' + n;
        break;
      case Date:
        a = '; expires=' + n.toUTCString()
    }
    return document.cookie = encodeURIComponent(t) + '=' + encodeURIComponent(e) + a + (i ? '; domain=' + i : '') + (r ? '; path=' + r : '') + (o ? '; secure' : ''),
    !0
  },
  removeItem: function (t, e, n) {
    return !(!t || !this.hasItem(t) || (document.cookie = encodeURIComponent(t) + '=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT' + (n ? '; domain=' + n : '') + (e ? '; path=' + e : ''), 0))
  },
  hasItem: i,
  keys: function () {
    for (var t = document.cookie.replace(/((?:^|\s*;)[^\=]+)(?=;|$)|^\s*|\s*(?:\=[^;]*)?(?:\1|$)/g, '').split(/\s*(?:\=[^;]*)?;\s*/), e = 0; e < t.length; e++) t[e] = decodeURIComponent(t[e]);
    return t
  }

      r.encode = function (t, e, n) {
        for (var r, o = null, a = [
        ], s = 0, c = 0; e < n; ) {
          var u = t[e++];
          switch (c) {
            case 0:
              a[s++] = i[u >> 2],
              r = (3 & u) << 4,

      },
      r.decode = function (t, e, n) {
        for (var r, i = n, a = 0, s = 0; s < t.length; ) {
          var c = t.charCodeAt(s++);
          if (61 === c && a > 1) break;
          if (void 0 === (c = o[c])) throw Error('invalid encoding');
          switch (a) {
            case 0:
              r = c,
              a = 1;
              break;
            case 1:
              e[n++] = r << 2 | (48 & c) >> 4,
              r = c,
              a = 2;
              break;

    function (t, e, n) {

      },
      r.prototype.onData = function (t) {

    function (t, e, n) {
      'use strict';
      function r(t) {
        return (t >>> 24 & 255) + (t >>> 8 & 65280) + ((65280 & t) << 8) + ((255 & t) << 24)
      }
      function i(t) {
        var e;
        return t && t.state ?       }
      function o(t) {
        var e;
        return t && t.state ? ((e = t.state).wsize = 0, e.whave = 0, e.wnext = 0, i(t))  : S
      }
      function a(t, e) {
        var n,
        r;
        return t && t.state ? (r = t.state, e < 0 ? (n = 0, e = - e)  : (n = 1 + (e >> 4), e < 48 && (e &= 15)), e && (e < 8 || e > 15) ? S : (null !== r.window && r.wbits !== e && (r.window = null), r.wrap = n, r.wbits = e, o(t)))  : S
      }
      function s(t, e) {
        var n,
        r;
        return t ? (r = new function () {
          this.mode = 0,
          this.last = !1,
          this.wrap = 0,
          this.havedict = !1,
          this.flags = 0,

          this.check = 0,
          this.total = 0,

          this.distdyn = null,
          this.sane = 0,
          this.back = 0,
          this.was = 0
        }, t.state = r, r.window = null, (n = a(t, e)) !== C && (t.state = null), n)  : S
      }
      function c(t) {
        if (dt) {
          var e;
          for (l = new d.Buf32(512), f = new d.Buf32(32), e = 0; e < 144; ) t.lens[e++] = 8;
          for (; e < 256; ) t.lens[e++] = 9;
          for (; e < 280; ) t.lens[e++] = 7;
          for (; e < 288; ) t.lens[e++] = 8;
          for (m(y, t.lens, 0, 288, l, 0, t.work, {
            bits: 9
          }), e = 0; e < 32; ) t.lens[e++] = 5;
          m(b, t.lens, 0, 32, f, 0, t.work, {
            bits: 5
          }),
          dt = !1
        }
        t.lencode = l,
        t.lenbits = 9,
        t.distcode = f,
        t.distbits = 5
      }
      function u(t, e, n, r) {
        var i,
        o = t.state;
        return null === o.window && (o.wsize = 1 << o.wbits, o.wnext = 0, o.whave = 0, o.window = new d.Buf8(o.wsize)),
        r >= o.wsize ? (d.arraySet(o.window, e, n - o.wsize, o.wsize, 0), o.wnext = 0, o.whave = o.wsize)  : ((i = o.wsize - o.wnext) > r && (i = r), d.arraySet(o.window, e, n - r, i, o.wnext), (r -= i) ? (d.arraySet(o.window, e, n - r, r, 0), o.wnext = r, o.whave = o.wsize)  : (o.wnext += i, o.wnext === o.wsize && (o.wnext = 0), o.whave < o.wsize && (o.whave += i))),
        0
      }
      var l,
      f,
      d = n(8),
      p = n(53),
      h = n(54),
      v = n(55),
      m = n(56),
      g = 0,
      y = 1,
      b = 2,
      w = 4,
      k = 5,
      x = 6,
      C = 0,
      I = 1,
      A = 2,
      S = - 2,
      _ = - 3,
      R = - 4,
      T = - 5,
      O = 8,
      E = 1,
      P = 2,
      j = 3,
      L = 4,
      M = 5,
      N = 6,
      D = 7,
      B = 8,
      G = 9,
      U = 10,
      F = 11,
      W = 12,
      z = 13,
      H = 14,
      V = 15,
      Y = 16,
      Z = 17,
      J = 18,
      Q = 19,
      X = 20,
      K = 21,
      q = 22,
      $ = 23,
      tt = 24,
      et = 25,
      nt = 26,
      rt = 27,
      it = 28,
      ot = 29,
      at = 30,
      st = 31,
      ct = 32,
      ut = 852,
      lt = 592,
      ft = 15,
      dt = !0;
      e.inflateReset = o,
      e.inflateReset2 = a,
      e.inflateResetKeep = i,
      e.inflateInit = function (t) {
        return s(t, ft)
      },
      e.inflateInit2 = s,
      e.inflate = function (t, e) {
        var n,
        i,
        o,
        a,
        s,
        l,
        f,
        ut,
        lt,
        ft,
        dt,
        pt,
        ht,
        vt,
        mt,
        gt,
        yt,
        bt,
        wt,
        kt,
        xt,
        Ct,
        It,
        At,
        St = 0,
        _t = new d.Buf8(4),
        Rt = [
          16,
          17,
          18,
          0,
          8,
          7,
          9,
          6,
          10,
          5,
          11,
          4,
          12,
          3,
          13,
          2,
          14,
          1,
          15
        ];
        if (!t || !t.state || !t.output || !t.input && 0 !== t.avail_in) return S;
        (n = t.state).mode === W && (n.mode = z),
        s = t.next_out,
        o = t.output,
        f = t.avail_out,
        a = t.next_in,
        i = t.input,
        l = t.avail_in,
        ut = n.hold,
        lt = n.bits,
        ft = l,
        dt = f,
        Ct = C;
        t: for (; ; ) switch (n.mode) {
          case E:
            if (0 === n.wrap) {
              n.mode = z;
              break
            }
            for (; lt < 16; ) {
              if (0 === l) break t;
              l--,
              ut += i[a++] << lt,
              lt += 8
            }
            if (2 & n.wrap && 35615 === ut) {
              n.check = 0,
              _t[0] = 255 & ut,
              _t[1] = ut >>> 8 & 255,
              n.check = h(n.check, _t, 2, 0),
              ut = 0,
              lt = 0,
              n.mode = P;
              break
            }
            if (n.flags = 0, n.head && (n.head.done = !1), !(1 & n.wrap) || (((255 & ut) << 8) + (ut >> 8)) % 31) {
              t.msg = 'incorrect header check',
              n.mode = at;
              break
            }
            if ((15 & ut) !== O) {
              t.msg = 'unknown compression method',
              n.mode = at;
              break
            }
            if (lt -= 4, xt = 8 + (15 & (ut >>>= 4)), 0 === n.wbits) n.wbits = xt;
             else if (xt > n.wbits) {
              t.msg = 'invalid window size',
              n.mode = at;
              break
            }
            n.dmax = 1 << xt,
            t.adler = n.check = 1,
            n.mode = 512 & ut ? U : W,
            ut = 0,
            lt = 0;
            break;
          case P:
            for (; lt < 16; ) {
              if (0 === l) break t;
              l--,
              ut += i[a++] << lt,
              lt += 8
            }
            if (n.flags = ut, (255 & n.flags) !== O) {
              t.msg = 'unknown compression method',
              n.mode = at;
              break
            }
            if (57344 & n.flags) {
              t.msg = 'unknown header flags set',
              n.mode = at;
              break
            }
            n.head && (n.head.text = ut >> 8 & 1),
            512 & n.flags && (_t[0] = 255 & ut, _t[1] = ut >>> 8 & 255, n.check = h(n.check, _t, 2, 0)),
            ut = 0,
            lt = 0,
            n.mode = j;
          case j:
            for (; lt < 32; ) {
              if (0 === l) break t;
              l--,
              ut += i[a++] << lt,
              lt += 8
            }
            n.head && (n.head.time = ut),
            512 & n.flags && (_t[0] = 255 & ut, _t[1] = ut >>> 8 & 255, _t[2] = ut >>> 16 & 255, _t[3] = ut >>> 24 & 255, n.check = h(n.check, _t, 4, 0)),
            ut = 0,
            lt = 0,
            n.mode = L;
          case L:
            for (; lt < 16; ) {
              if (0 === l) break t;
              l--,
              ut += i[a++] << lt,
              lt += 8
            }
            n.head && (n.head.xflags = 255 & ut, n.head.os = ut >> 8),
            512 & n.flags && (_t[0] = 255 & ut, _t[1] = ut >>> 8 & 255, n.check = h(n.check, _t, 2, 0)),
            ut = 0,
            lt = 0,
            n.mode = M;
          case M:
            if (1024 & n.flags) {
              for (; lt < 16; ) {
                if (0 === l) break t;
                l--,
                ut += i[a++] << lt,
                lt += 8
              }
              n.length = ut,
              n.head && (n.head.extra_len = ut),
              512 & n.flags && (_t[0] = 255 & ut, _t[1] = ut >>> 8 & 255, n.check = h(n.check, _t, 2, 0)),
              ut = 0,
              lt = 0
            } else n.head && (n.head.extra = null);
            n.mode = N;
          case N:
            if (1024 & n.flags && ((pt = n.length) > l && (pt = l), pt && (n.head && (xt = n.head.extra_len - n.length, n.head.extra || (n.head.extra = new Array(n.head.extra_len)), d.arraySet(n.head.extra, i, a, pt, xt)), 512 & n.flags && (n.check = h(n.check, i, pt, a)), l -= pt, a += pt, n.length -= pt), n.length)) break t;
            n.length = 0,
            n.mode = D;
          case D:
            if (2048 & n.flags) {
              if (0 === l) break t;
              pt = 0;
              do {
                xt = i[a + pt++],
                n.head && xt && n.length < 65536 && (n.head.name += String.fromCharCode(xt))
              } while (xt && pt < l);
              if (512 & n.flags && (n.check = h(n.check, i, pt, a)), l -= pt, a += pt, xt) break t
            } else n.head && (n.head.name = null);
            n.length = 0,
            n.mode = B;
          case B:
            if (4096 & n.flags) {
              if (0 === l) break t;
              pt = 0;
              do {
                xt = i[a + pt++],
                n.head && xt && n.length < 65536 && (n.head.comment += String.fromCharCode(xt))
              } while (xt && pt < l);
              if (512 & n.flags && (n.check = h(n.check, i, pt, a)), l -= pt, a += pt, xt) break t
            } else n.head && (n.head.comment = null);
            n.mode = G;
          case G:
            if (512 & n.flags) {
              for (; lt < 16; ) {
                if (0 === l) break t;
                l--,
                ut += i[a++] << lt,
                lt += 8
              }
              if (ut !== (65535 & n.check)) {
                t.msg = 'header crc mismatch',
                n.mode = at;
                break
              }
              ut = 0,
              lt = 0
            }
            n.head && (n.head.hcrc = n.flags >> 9 & 1, n.head.done = !0),
            t.adler = n.check = 0,
            n.mode = W;
            break;
          case U:
            for (; lt < 32; ) {
              if (0 === l) break t;
              l--,
              ut += i[a++] << lt,
              lt += 8
            }
            t.adler = n.check = r(ut),
            ut = 0,
            lt = 0,
            n.mode = F;
          case F:
            if (0 === n.havedict) return t.next_out = s,
            t.avail_out = f,
            t.next_in = a,
            t.avail_in = l,
            n.hold = ut,
            n.bits = lt,
            A;
            t.adler = n.check = 1,
            n.mode = W;
          case W:
            if (e === k || e === x) break t;
          case z:
            if (n.last) {
              ut >>>= 7 & lt,
              lt -= 7 & lt,
              n.mode = rt;
              break
            }
            for (; lt < 3; ) {
              if (0 === l) break t;
              l--,
              ut += i[a++] << lt,
              lt += 8
            }
            switch (n.last = 1 & ut, lt -= 1, 3 & (ut >>>= 1)) {
              case 0:
                n.mode = H;
                break;
              case 1:
                if (c(n), n.mode = X, e === x) {
                  ut >>>= 2,
                  lt -= 2;
                  break t
                }
                break;
              case 2:
                n.mode = Z;
                break;
              case 3:
                t.msg = 'invalid block type',
                n.mode = at
            }
            ut >>>= 2,
            lt -= 2;
            break;
          case H:
            for (ut >>>= 7 & lt, lt -= 7 & lt; lt < 32; ) {
              if (0 === l) break t;
              l--,
              ut += i[a++] << lt,
              lt += 8
          }
          if ((65535 & ut) != (ut >>> 16 ^ 65535)) {
            t.msg = 'invalid stored block lengths',
            n.mode = at;
            break
        }
        if (n.length = 65535 & ut, ut = 0, lt = 0, n.mode = V, e === x) break t;
      case V:
        n.mode = Y;
      case Y:
        if (pt = n.length) {
          if (pt > l && (pt = l), pt > f && (pt = f), 0 === pt) break t;
          d.arraySet(o, i, a, pt, s),
          l -= pt,
          a += pt,
          f -= pt,
          s += pt,
          n.length -= pt;
          break
      }
      n.mode = W;
      break;
    case Z:
      for (; lt < 14; ) {
        if (0 === l) break t;
        l--,
        ut += i[a++] << lt,
        lt += 8
    }
    if (n.nlen = 257 + (31 & ut), ut >>>= 5, lt -= 5, n.ndist = 1 + (31 & ut), ut >>>= 5, lt -= 5, n.ncode = 4 + (15 & ut), ut >>>= 4, lt -= 4, n.nlen > 286 || n.ndist > 30) {
      t.msg = 'too many length or distance symbols',
      n.mode = at;
      break
  }
  n.have = 0,
  n.mode = J;
case J:
  for (; n.have < n.ncode; ) {
    for (; lt < 3; ) {
      if (0 === l) break t;
      l--,
      ut += i[a++] << lt,
      lt += 8
    }
    n.lens[Rt[n.have++]] = 7 & ut,
    ut >>>= 3,
    lt -= 3
}

function (t, e) {
e.Patterns = {
PATTERN000: 0,
PATTERN001: 1,
PATTERN010: 2,
PATTERN011: 3,
PATTERN100: 4,
PATTERN101: 5,
PATTERN110: 6,
PATTERN111: 7
};
var n = 3,
r = 3,
i = 40,
o = 10;
function a(t, n, r) {
switch (t) {
case e.Patterns.PATTERN000:
return (n + r) % 2 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN001:
return n % 2 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN010:
return r % 3 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN011:
return (n + r) % 3 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN100:
return (Math.floor(n / 2) + Math.floor(r / 3)) % 2 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN101:
return n * r % 2 + n * r % 3 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN110:
return (n * r % 2 + n * r % 3) % 2 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN111:
return (n * r % 3 + (n + r) % 2) % 2 == 0;
default:
throw new Error('bad maskPattern:' + t)
}
}
e.isValid = function (t) {
return null != t && '' !== t && !isNaN(t) && t >= 0 && t <= 7
},
e.from = function (t) {
return e.isValid(t) ? parseInt(t, 10)  : void 0
},
e.getPenaltyN1 = function (t) {

i = o = 0,
a = s = null;

(l = t.get(u, c)) === s ? o++ : (o >= 5 && (r += n + (o - 5)), s = l, o = 1)
}
i >= 5 && (r += n + (i - 5)),
o >= 5 && (r += n + (o - 5))
}

},
e.getPenaltyN2 = function (t) {

4 !== a && 0 !== a || n++
}

},
e.getPenaltyN3 = function (t) {

r = o = 0;

s >= 10 && (1488 === r || 93 === r) && n++,
o = o << 1 & 2047 | t.get(s, a),
s >= 10 && (1488 === o || 93 === o) && n++
}

},

},

},

s < o && (o = s, i = a)
}

}

e = new i.BCoinPay(this.payType, this.goodsId, this.goodsNum);

e = new o.CashPay(this.payType, this.goodsId, this.goodsNum)
}

},

this.currentPayMethod.payMethodType !== t && (this.currentPayMethod.clear(), this.currentPayMethod = this.createPayMethod(t))
},

this.payType = null,
this.isOpenStore = !1,
this.currentPayMethod && this.currentPayMethod.clear(),
this.currentPayMethod = null,

this.bCoin = 0,
this.goldSeed = 0,
this.successCallback = null,
this.failCallback = null
},

this.successCallback && this.successCallback()
},
t.prototype.payFail = function (t) {
this.failCallback && this.failCallback(t)
},
t
}()

function (t, e) {
e.Patterns = {
PATTERN000: 0,
PATTERN001: 1,
PATTERN010: 2,
PATTERN011: 3,
PATTERN100: 4,
PATTERN101: 5,
PATTERN110: 6,
PATTERN111: 7
};
var n = 3,
r = 3,
i = 40,
o = 10;
function a(t, n, r) {
switch (t) {
case e.Patterns.PATTERN000:
return (n + r) % 2 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN001:
return n % 2 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN010:
return r % 3 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN011:
return (n + r) % 3 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN100:
return (Math.floor(n / 2) + Math.floor(r / 3)) % 2 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN101:
return n * r % 2 + n * r % 3 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN110:
return (n * r % 2 + n * r % 3) % 2 == 0;
case e.Patterns.PATTERN111:
return (n * r % 3 + (n + r) % 2) % 2 == 0;
default:
throw new Error('bad maskPattern:' + t)
}
}

e.getPenaltyN2 = function (t) {

},
e.getPenaltyN3 = function (t) {
